column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ A drunken man beat to death his partner at 11:20 pm August 5
column4: 2019 in Por Sen Chey district.------Phong Samnang
column5: a 23-year-old male and victim Noun Vanary
column7: from Takeo province has been living together as man and wife for over a year.------The perpetrator admitted to police that he was often jealous of his wife.------On the day of the incident
column8: he came from drinking with friends
column9: drunk and and violently attacked her
column10: hitting the woman in the face causing her fatal wounds.------Shortly after the incident
column11: neighbors in the area reported to local authorities
column12: who detained the man for questioning and to send the case to the district police of Pur Sen Chey. ------POST
